term.project.cis350

Class Search

  • java.lang.Object
    • term.project.cis350.Search

  • public class Search
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that contains methods for searching, rating, and saving movies to watch later.
    Author:
    Dan Schindler

    • Constructor Detail

      • Search

        public Search()
        Default constructor connects to a user's account. Then it checks if this program has been run on their account before. If they have not used this program before, it creates a list to track recommended movies. If they have used this program before, it finds the ID of the recommended movie list and saves it.

      • setGenre

        public java.lang.Boolean setGenre(java.lang.String genre)
        Sets the current genre and updates the search to include the new parameter.
        Parameters:
        genre - The new genre to search with.
        Returns:
        true Shows the update was successful.

      • getGenreList

      • getGenreAvail

        public java.lang.String[] getGenreAvail()
        returns the list of available Genres.
        Returns:
        genreListAvail.toArray(new String[tempSize]); the list of available genres.

      • setEra

        public java.lang.Boolean setEra(java.lang.String era)
        Sets the date range to be searched. If this fails, defaults to default search date range.
        Parameters:
        era - The decade to be searched (lower bound. Ex, 1980 gives an upper bound of 1989).
        Returns:
        Boolean returns true to show that the method has been successfully called.

      • getCurEra

        public java.lang.String getCurEra()
        getter for the current time frame being searched.
        Returns:
        curEra the current time frame being searched.

      • setRating

        public java.lang.Boolean setRating(java.lang.String rating)
        Sets the minimum acceptable rating for searches.
        Parameters:
        rating - the desired rating to search at or above.
        Returns:
        true shows that the method has been successfully called.

      • getCurRating

        public java.lang.String getCurRating()
        returns the current minimum acceptable rating to search with.
        Returns:
        curRating The current minimum acceptable rating.

      • recListCheck

        private boolean recListCheck()
        Checks if there is already a recommended movie list created from this program. If there is no such list, this method creates a list.
        Returns:
        boolean Whether or not the list exists already.

      • watchLaterCheck

        private boolean watchLaterCheck()
        Checks if the user has our watch later list already set up on their account. saves the list ID and its movies locally
        Returns:
        boolean returns true or false if the account has the list already set up or not.

      • updateRecFromRating

        public void updateRecFromRating(int rating)
        Chooses to either add a movie to watch later and add similar movies to recommended list, or remove movie from recommended as well as remove other similar movies.
        Parameters:
        rating - The interest rating given to a movie.

      • updateRecPositive

        private void updateRecPositive(int rating)
        If the user 'swiped' right and wants to add movie to watch later list and they want more recommendations like this one, this method updates the recommended list as well as the current movie.
        Parameters:
        rating - The rating that the user gave the movie (v1.0 is automatically full score)

      • updateRecNegative

        private void updateRecNegative(int rating)
        If the user 'swiped' left and doesn't want to add movie to watch later list and they don't want more recommendations like this one, this method updates the recommended list as well as the current movie.
        Parameters:
        rating - The rating that the user gave the movie (v1.0 is automatically zero score)

      • manageList

        private void manageList(int rating,
                        boolean isPositive)
        Updates the watch later and recommendations lists based on the movie interest rating assigned by user.
        Parameters:
        rating - The interest rating assigned to the movie.
        isPositive - Whether the rating was positive or negative.

      • updateSearch

        private void updateSearch()
        This method updates the search list and updates the output by calling a private method.

      • updateOutput

        private void updateOutput()
        Updates the current movie by comparing the search results to the recommended list.

      • getPoster

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getPoster()
        Returns the current movie's poster.
        Returns:
        picture The poster's picture.

      • rateMovie

        public void rateMovie(int rating)
        Assigns the user's rating to the current movie.
        Parameters:
        rating - the rating that the user wants to assign to the movie.

      • basicSearch

        private void basicSearch()
        Uses parameters saved within the class to narrow the results from the recommended list.

      • updateGenreList

        private void updateGenreList(LocMov movie)
        adds genres to the list of available genres based on genres that haven't been added but apply to a movie.
        Parameters:
        movie - The movie that is being checked for new genres.

      • getMovieToWatch

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getMovieToWatch()
        Retrieves a movie from the watch later list, notes which movie it is, and then returns the poster for the movie.
        Returns:
        suggestedPoster The poster of the suggested movie.

      • getSessionToken

        private info.movito.themoviedbapi.model.core.SessionToken getSessionToken()
        used for logging in to the movie database.
        Returns:
        sessionToken the session login information.

      • getOutput

        public java.util.List<info.movito.themoviedbapi.model.MovieDb> getOutput()
        Gets the output.
        Returns:
        output The list of movies that are on the recommended list, selection limited by search parameters.

      • setOutput

        public void setOutput(java.util.List<info.movito.themoviedbapi.model.MovieDb> output)
        Sets the output.
        Parameters:
        output - The list of movies that are on the recommended list, selection limited by search parameters.
